recipesJson.name: Good ol' Blueberry Custard
recipesJson.author: MCrane81
recipesJson.description:
A good, solid old fashioned blueberry custard. 
Sweet custard, with bright blueberries, using common ingredients that most people have in their inventory. 

Can 100% be used as a shake and vape, but best after a week.

reviews.text: Will update review later as I have just mixed. Such a thick, rich, buttery custard. Absolutely delicious custard. Right now not getting much blueberry at all. I'm sure once it steeps and the custard pulls back a little it will come through. But just on the custard flavor alone I will vape this all day.
